member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.HotelsController.GetHotels
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all hotels from DB.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.HotelsController.GetHotelById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific hotel by id.
member.returns: A hotel with a specific id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.HotelsController.GetFilteredHotels(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves filtered hotels by city, descending ordered by rating.
member.remarks: Sample URL request: https://localhost:44335/reservations/filter?$city=braila Sample parameter: braila
member.returns: A list of hotels located in the specified city, descending ordered by rating.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.HotelsController.PutHotel(System.Int32,HotelBooking.Hotel)
member.summary: Edit any properties of a specific hotel you mention by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReservationsController.GetReservations
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all reservations from DB.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReservationsController.GetReservationById(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific reservation by id.
member.returns: Returns the reservation specified by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReservationsController.PutReservation(System.Int64,HotelBooking.Reservation)
member.summary: Edit any properties of a specific reservation you mention by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReservationsController.DeleteMovie(System.Int64)
member.summary: Deletes the reservation you specify by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReservationsController.GetFilteredReservations(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves filtered reservations by id of user that added it.
member.returns: A list of reservations made by a specific user.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReviewsController.GetReviews
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all reviews from DB.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReviewsController.GetReview(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific review by id.
member.returns: Returns the specified review by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReviewsController.PutReview(System.Int32,HotelBooking.Models.Review)
member.summary: Edit any properties of a specific review you mention by id.

member.name: M:HotelBooking.Controllers.ReviewsController.PostReview(HotelBooking.Models.Review)
member.remarks:
Sample request:
POST /review { "HotelId": 2, "UserId": 2, "Text": "Awesome view to the ocean.", "Rating": 9 }
